root.name: Mobile Suit Gundam: Gundam vs. Zeta Gundam
root.description: Take control of your favourite mobile suit in this game based on the popular anime television series. In this game you can duke it in an arena mode, or play the campaign. You can also enjoy in split screen multiplayer. This game features characters and objects found in the series, though not all characters have correct voice overs.

similar_games.game: Mobile Suit Gundam: Federation vs. Zeon
Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam: AEUG vs. Titans
Mobile Suit Gundam SEED: Rengou vs. Z.A.F.T.
